The living space is open and plentiful, with a cozy pellet stove tucked into the corner to take off the winter chill, and take the bite out of heating costs. The master is large and wonderfully accented with local wood and country charm. The bathroom is roomy and nicely modern. The roof was new 3.5 years ago and will be functional for years to come. The side yard is fully fenced for the kids and pets! This home is in top condition throughout and ready for you to move on in!

Public Remarks: IMAGINE... you drive roughly 30 minutes from 100 Mile House to the end of a quiet country road and enter your own private 11+ acre retreat. As you step out of the vehicle you hear nothing but the call of a loon. Over the bridge that crosses a meandering creek to the grassy hillside you see a deer lift its head from grazing to watch an eagle wage war over an osprey. Your family has already set up camp & is out catching rainbow trout in Watch Lake which is the natural boundary of part of your property. You survey the tidy grounds, admiring the 1 room cabin, fairy hut, workshop or potential bunkhouse, shed, rustic outhouse & newer shower/outhouse. You are unplugged but you have never felt more connected to nature. Sound good? This could be yours L#8035
